title: random visual bug during gameplay
body: the only way for me to explain this is during game i get one frame of static randomly throughout the game and can happen more then once it doesnt appear on the replay, ive gone to the times in game to see if it will happen but does not my i have tried recording the screen once got nothing that game so i dont know if its a bug with the game or something with my graphics card which i doubt being that its a 1080ti if anyone has this issue to please help i cant find anything on this

replies.body:
That sounds potentially irritating or spooky... or both! Maybe that's just me though, the whole white-noise thing creeps me out. xP

Back on track, I'm not quite certain what would cause it. If you suspect that there's even a chance your graphics card may be a cause, it's a safe bet to check your graphics drivers with [**these steps here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2)! Otherwise, I definitely recommend reaching out to our Tech team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Even in cases where you don't have a recording, I bet they could find out what's causing those moments of static provided some creepy digital ghost isn't trying to communicate with you! :)
